scripts.test-remote: NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register --no-warnings' locklift test --disable-build --network dev --config locklift.config.js --test test
scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register --no-warnings' locklift test --disable-build --network local --config locklift.config.js --test test
scripts.deploy-market-local: NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register --no-warnings' locklift run -n local --config locklift.config.js --script 1-deploy-market.js
